info.h2: OnCall I.P. Phone System (U.I. Demo) / Interface Design

extra.t:
This application for demonstrate the User Interface of OnCall I.P. phone system. It have removed all I.P. Phone functions.

To access the application, please follow the steps below:

  1. Download OnCall from here.
  2. Type anything on the “User Name” and “Password” filed
  3. Press login.
  4. Please feel free to play around..
